categories.body: The Legend of Korra episode transcripts

paragraphs.body: The scene changes to Future Industries airship leaving the Earth Kingdom Royal Palace. The screen shows Asami piloting the airship.
paragraphs.text: The scene changes to Future Industries airship leaving the Earth Kingdom Royal Palace. The screen shows Asami piloting the airship.

paragraphs.body: Scene changes to an overhead view of a neighborhood of Lower Ring houses and zooms in to show a hungry Bolin and Mako walking along the street. Cut to Mako and Bolin walking along the street as the latter holds his stomach.

paragraphs.body: Scene shifts to some buildings in the Lower Ring of Ba Sing Se.

paragraphs.body: Scene shifts to the Earth Kingdom Royal Palace with Korra, Gun, and Hou-Ting.
